name: Awesome Addons For Elementor
author: Awesome Addons

sections.description:
It’s time to take your Elementor page building experience to the next level. It’s time to experience the most uniue Elementor widgets with the most advanced options. It’s time for Awesome Addons for Elementor.

With our 30+ advanced widgets you can create slick and sophisticated websites in less time with no coding required. Each widget is highly customizable, has trendy and unique design and lots of advanced options. So you can literelly create anything you want, only sky is the limit!

INCLUDED 30+ FREE WIDGETS AND COUNTING

We packed 30+ most useful widgets with unique designs to enhance your Elementor Page Building experience.

Post Widgets:

  1. Post Grid – 2/3/4 column post grid
  2. Post Masonry – 2/3/4 column post masonry style
  3. Post List – Show you posts in list styles
  4. Post Carousel – Even you can create carousel from your posts

Content Widgets

  1. Team Member – Feature your team members with few clicks
  2. Alerts – Take alert styles to next level
  3. Inline Notices – Show notices in boxes
  4. Quotes Card – Feature quotes in style
  5. Logo Carousel – Highlight brands/product logos in carousel
  6. Tabs – Include tab to put information in different styles
  7. Advanced Buttons – Forget about the boring default buttons
  8. Dual Buttons – Bual buttons are perfect for ecommerce and promotions
  9. Timeline – Interactive timeline to show various contents
  10. Search Box – Put a search box anywhere
  11. Divider – Section divider with 4 styles

Creative Widgets

  1. Icon Box – Create beautiful icon boxes using icons, links and texts, and make them slick using the built in positioning features
  2. Promo Box – – Showcare your content heading in amazing way
  3. Image Compare – Let your viewers compare between two images
  4. Fun Factors – Show your facts & figures with counter widget
  5. Progress Bar – Display progress bars with 4+ different styles
  6. Countdown – Create sense of urgency with this widget. It’s perfect for under construction pages, events, sale items, etc

Testimonials and Reviews Widgets:

  1. Testimonial Card – Showcase what other said about your brand & Increase Your Credibility
  2. Testimonial Slider – Showcase what other said about your brand & Increase Your Credibility in interactive sliders

Tables, Charts and Data Widgets:

  1. Pricing Table – SCreate beautiful pricing tables with lots of customizations and sleek look-n-feel using this widget
  2. Pricing Menu – Create beautiful pricing menu with lots of customizations using this widget

Social Feed Widgets:

  1. Instagram Feed – Showcase your Instagram photos to your visitor
  2. Twitter Feed – Showcase your latest tweets to your visitor

Form Widgets

  1. Gravity Forms – Completely customizable and you can control any styling.
  2. Ninja Forms – Easily create your form style just the way you want
  3. Caldera Forms – Design effective mobile-friendly forms
  4. WPForms – Create powerful WordPress forms in minutes
  5. weForms – Get the fastest form building experience
  6. MailChimp for WP – Get beautiful MailChimp newsletter subcription form

More free widgets and design variations coming every week!

Features

  • 30+ Advanced Widgets: Use Advanced Addons unique templates and sections to design your website and stand out from the crowd.

  • Completely Customizable: Every element comes with bunch of options to control every possible things. You can achieve any design with your imagination.

  • Elements Control Panel and Settings Page: Enable and disable individual elements to make your page loading faster and smoother. You can deactivate unnecessary widgets to keep the site lite.

  • Lightning Fast: No extra resources or messy codes to slow down your website. Optimized for super fast loading and instant live editing.

  • Expert Support: We have an extra-ordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, or contact us directly through our contact form.

Documentation and Support

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at Advanced Addons for Elementor.

Report Bugs or Contribute

Bug reports are welcomed on GitHub. Please note GitHub is not a support forum, and issues that aren’t properly qualified as bugs will be closed. If you want to contribute on this project, please fork the repository from Github.
sections.installation:
It’s really easy to install Advanced Addons for Elementor plugin, but before installing it make sure you’ve installed Elementor. Elementor is the only dependency.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.7 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 128 MB or greater

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen in WordPress.
  2. Search for Advanced Addons for Elementor.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it.

Manual Installation

  1. Download Awesome Addons for Elementor.
  2. Extract the 'awesome-addons-for-elementor'.zip file. You’ll get plugin files inside 'awesome-addons-for-elementor' directory.
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/'awesome-addons-for-elementor' directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin without Elementor?

No. You cannot use it without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work along with other Elementor addons?

Yes. You can use it with other Elementor addons.

Does it work with any theme?

Yes. It will work with any WordPress theme.

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

Yes, absolutely.
